mapper.sql: ID, SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID, FULL_SCORE, LET_NUM, LET_SF, SP_LET_WF, DRAW_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME

if.test: lotteryIssue == null and matchStatus == null and systemCode == null

sql.if: AND B.ISSUE_CODE is not null AND B.MATCH_STATUS in (9,10,11,12,13,17)

mapper.sql: FROM SPORT_AGAINST_INFO B LEFT JOIN SPORT_DRAW_WF A ON A.SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN SPORT_DATA_BJ_SP C ON C.SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN LOTTERY_ISSUE E ON E.ISSUE_CODE = B.ISSUE_CODE AND E.LOTTERY_CODE = B.LOTTERY_CODE LEFT JOIN SPORT_MATCH_INFO M ON M.ID = B.SPORT_MATCH_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN SPORT_TEAM_INFO H ON H.ID = B.HOME_TEAM_ID LEFT JOIN SPORT_TEAM_INFO G ON G.ID = B.VISITI_TEAM_ID LEFT JOIN SPORT_STATUS_BJ I ON I.SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID = B.ID WHERE 1=1 AND B.LOTTERY_CODE = #{lotteryCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT B.ID AS againstId , B.ISSUE_CODE AS issueCode, B.SYSTEM_CODE AS systemCode, B.START_TIME AS startTime, B.MATCH_STATUS AS matchStatus, B.MATCH_ANALYSIS_URL AS analysisUrl, A.LET_NUM AS letNum, B.OFFICIAL_ID AS officialId, B.SALE_END_TIME AS saleEndTime, A.FULL_SCORE AS fullScore, A.SP_LET_WF AS spLetWf, E.SALE_STATUS AS saleStatus, M.MATCH_FULL_NAME AS matchFullName, M.MATCH_SHORT_NAME AS matchShortName, H.TEAM_FULL_NAME AS homeTeamFullName, H.TEAM_SHORT_NAME AS homeTeamShortName, G.TEAM_FULL_NAME AS guestTeamFullName, G.TEAM_SHORT_NAME AS guestTeamShortName, B.IS_RECOMMEND AS isRecommend
ORDER BY B.SYSTEM_CODE DESC,B.ID DESC

SELECT A.SYSTEM_CODE, A.HOME_NAME, A.VISITI_NAME, A.START_TIME, B.FULL_SCORE, B.LET_SF, B.LET_NUM, B.SP_LET_WF FROM SPORT_AGAINST_INFO A LEFT JOIN SPORT_DRAW_WF B ON A.ID = B.SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID WHERE A.LOTTERY_CODE = #{lotteryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SYSTEM_CODE IN (${systemCode}) ORDER BY FIELD(A.SYSTEM_CODE, ${systemCode})
mapper.update:
insert into SPORT_DRAW_WF(ID, SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID, FULL_SCORE, LET_NUM, LET_SF, SP_LET_WF, DRAW_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME) values(#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sportAgainstInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fullScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{letNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{letSf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spLetWf,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{drawTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE FULL_SCORE = #{fullScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LET_NUM = #{letNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LET_SF = #{letSf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SP_LET_WF = #{spLetWf,jdbcType=FLOAT},
DRAW_TIME = #{drawTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=OTHER},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
